name: BCP_message
brief: Abstract message passing interface for BCP parallelism

algorithms.name:
Message Passing: PVM/MPI/Single Process Abstraction

BCP_message_environment is the base class for all message passing
implementations. Derived classes implement the protocol:

**Implementations:**
- BCP_message_single: Single-process (no parallelism)
- BCP_message_pvm: PVM (Parallel Virtual Machine)
- BCP_message_mpi: MPI (Message Passing Interface)

**Core operations:**
- register_process(): Get process ID
- parent_process(): Get spawning process ID
- alive(): Test if processes are running

**Point-to-point:**
- send(): Send message to specific process
- receive(): Blocking receive with timeout
- probe(): Non-blocking check for messages

**Collective:**
- multicast(): Send to multiple processes
- start_process(): Spawn new process
- start_processes(): Spawn multiple processes

**Message tags (BCP_message_tag):**
Predefined tags for different message types (node data,
solutions, cuts, variables, etc.)
